amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding levels for combat operations in Afghanistan in order to achieve a U.S. presence of no more than 25,000 troops by December 31, 2012 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike $20,887,651,000 from title IX and increase the Spending Reduction Account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 133 - 295 (Roll no. 503).
